chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to a movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.chunk_text: Hello, everyone.Welcome to English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.您好,歡迎收聽口說英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we're going to talk about fruits.這個單元,我們要來聊聊水果。那麼首先,我們就來聽聽今天的問題。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a fruit popular in your country. 台灣是水果寶島想用英文介紹你最愛的水果怎麼說呢.json

chunks.chunk_text: questionDescribe a fruit popular in your country and talk about why this is a popular fruit in your country.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a fruit popular in your country. 台灣是水果寶島想用英文介紹你最愛的水果怎麼說呢.json

chunks.chunk_text: Summer in Taiwan can be warm sometimes.In the heat of summer, a slice of watermelon can quench your thirst in an instant.I think people love watermelon for a couple of reasons.First of all, the fruit gained popularity for its taste and it refreshes people within a short time.A major part of the fruit contains water, and it helps to hydrate the body.The sweet flavor of the fruit is another reason to attract
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a fruit popular in your country. 台灣是水果寶島想用英文介紹你最愛的水果怎麼說呢.json

chunks.chunk_text: people.Furthermore, the fruit is rich in vitamins.When someone takes the fruit, it helps to make them feel full of energy.Of course, I like watermelon.This is one of my favorite fruits during summertime.

chunks.chunk_text: It is known by many as the kingdom of fruit.

chunks.chunk_text: The kingdom of fruit就是水果王國了。You can enjoy varieties of delicious sweet fruit available year-round.

chunks.chunk_text: Talking about the most popular fruit, watermelon is the one that is loved by all.

chunks.chunk_text: A couple of 這個片語指的就是兩個。First of all, the fruit gained popularity for its taste and it refreshes within a short time.

chunks.chunk_text: The sweet flavor of the fruit is another reason to attract people.The fruit is rich in vitamins.

chunks.chunk_text: Language Focus 學習焦點The one that 這邊 the one 後面接著一個 that 的 關係代名詞子句 表示的就是 就是那一個 我們看一下例子

chunks.chunk_text: The one that plays better defense will win. 這句話就是說 防守比較好的那一隊就會贏。Fame is the one that does not stay. 這是美國著名的女詩人Emily Dickinson所說的 名聲是不會久遠的呀。Words and phrases 詞彙片語
